tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SecurityAssessment (
    assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    database_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    findings JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE security_assessments (
    assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    database_name TEXT,
    assessment_type TEXT,
    result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_taken TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE security_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    security_level VARCHAR(50),
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE database_configurations (
    config_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    database_name VARCHAR(50),
    config_parameter VARCHAR(50),
    config_value VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    action_performed VARCHAR(255),
    user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id UUID,
    vulnerability TEXT,
    severity TEXT,
    remediation_plan TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES assessments(assessment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    time_logged TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(50),
    assessor_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE database_configuration (
    config_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    database_name VARCHAR(50),
    config_setting VARCHAR(100),
    setting_value VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    result_details TEXT,
    result_score DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    permissions JSON
)
